name: Still Life 7.0
description: Fizz Pop (b.1974), Still Life 7.0, 2010, 4200 x 3360 pixels [Source: Rachel Ruysch, Still Life with Flowers on a Marble Tabletop, 1716, oil on canvas, 48.5 cm x 39.5 cm]  —  The most popular digital painting from the Still Life series, Still Life 7.0 was released in 2010 as an edition of 7, 30” X 24” cibachrome prints, face mounted to plexi, aluminum backed & braced, as well as an edition of 21, 14" X 11” cibachrome prints.  Before the cibachrome print was discontinued, all the smaller editions were produced, but only one from the larger edition.  Minting Still Life 7.0 shows the potential of the digital asset to complete editions.
